Video Stream - Dual H.264 or better
Remote Access - Via web browser for Configuration, Viewing & control
Remote Access - Simultaneously access at any time at minimum 10 users
Supported Protocols - As per system design for real-time live monitoring and recording using IPv4, HTTP, TCP, RTSP, RTP, ICMP, UDP, DNS, DHCP etc.
Storage facility to keep the complete recording till closure of project
